name: Roasted Garlic Bulbs
description: Garlic is a powerful antioxidant, boosting the immune system.

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Toasted Oninion

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 350° F (175° C).
  2. Trim top and bottom of garlic bulbs and place in a mini baker.
  3. Drizzle with oil and add Salt, Pepper and Dip Mix to taste. Cover and bake for 30–40 minutes, or until garlic is soft and tender.
  4. When cooled, gently squeeze each clove to extract garlic.
tips:
Serving Suggestions:

  • Spread on crackers or toasted French baguette rounds
  • Mash with Pesto Sauce Mix or tapenade herbs for a delicious spread
  • Add to mashed potatoes
  • Mix with butter for great garlic bread
  • Insert under chicken skin before roasting
